data.DescriptionHtml: This spell functions like summon undead I, except that you can summon one undead from the 4th-level list, two undead of the same kind from the 3rd-level list, or four undead of the same kind from a lower-level list.
data.Effect: One or more summoned creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.Name: Summon Undead IV
data.Rulebook: Libris Mortis: The Book of the Dead
